templates.name: PostgreSQL zabbix-extensions Custom
templates.description: Template providing PostgreSQL monitoring (part of https://github.com/lesovsky/zabbix-extensions). Template was formerly known as pgCayenne.

items.name: PostgreSQL pg_buffercache (internal item)
items.description: Internal item to fetch all pg_buffercache values in a single call

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: blocks hit per second
items.description: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache, so that a read was not necessary (this only includes hits in the PostgreSQL buffer cache, not the operating system's file system cache)

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: blocks read per second
items.description: Number of disk blocks read per second

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: registered conflicts
items.description: Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database. (Conflicts occur only on standby servers; see pg_stat_database_conflicts for details.).

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: temp_bytes written
items.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: temp_files created
items.description: Number of temporary files created by queries. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created (e.g., sorting or hashing), and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: tuples deleted per second
items.description: Number of rows deleted by queries.

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: tuples fetched per second
items.description: Number of rows fetched by queries.

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: tuples inserted per second
items.description: Number of rows inserted by queries.

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: tuples returned per second
items.description: Number of rows returned by queries.

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: tuples updated per second
items.description: Number of rows updated by queries.

items.name: PostgresSQL dbstat: commits per second
items.description: Number of transactions that have been committed.

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat: rollbacks per second
items.description: Number of transactions that have been rolled back.

items.name: PostgreSQL dbstat (internal item)
items.description: Internal item to fetch all pg_stat_database sum values in a single call

items.name: PostgreSQL streaming replication: recovery state
items.description: Streaming replication state: t (true) if service is in recovery mode, and f (false) if server in master mode.

discovery_rules.name: PostgreSQL streaming stand-by discovery
discovery_rules.description: Low level discovery for streaming replication servers which connected to this server.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL packet loss with {#HOTSTANDBY}, %

trigger_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL packet loss between {HOSTNAME} and {#HOTSTANDBY} too high ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL streaming lag with {#HOTSTANDBY} in bytes

trigger_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL streaming lag between {HOSTNAME} and {#HOTSTANDBY} too high ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL streaming lag with {#HOTSTANDBY} in seconds
item_prototypes.description:
ATTENTION: This check requires access to the remote server postgresql service, respectively, should be determined access in pg_hba.conf on remote server.
Example:
host zabbix postgres 1.2.3.4/32 trust

trigger_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL streaming lag between {HOSTNAME} and {#HOTSTANDBY} too high ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})

discovery_rules.name: PostgreSQL database tables discovery
discovery_rules.description:
PostgreSQL tables discovery. Use regular expressions to configure search.
Disabled by default because may add too many items.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL: table {#TABLENAME} indexes size
item_prototypes.description: PostgreSQL all indexes size which belongs to a single table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL: table {#TABLENAME} size
item_prototypes.description: PostgreSQL single table size.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: analyzes
item_prototypes.description: Number of analyze operations performed on this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: autoanalyzes
item_prototypes.description: Number of autoanalyze operations performed on this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: autovacuums
item_prototypes.description: Number of autovacuum operations performed on this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: cache blocks hits per second
item_prototypes.description: Number of buffer hits in this table

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: cache blocks read per second
item_prototypes.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: index blocks hit per second
item_prototypes.description: Number of buffer hits in all indexes on this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: index blocks read per second
item_prototypes.description: Number of disk blocks read from all indexes on this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: index scans
item_prototypes.description: Number of index scans initiated on this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: tuples read per second by index scans
item_prototypes.description: Number of live rows fetched by index scans.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: dead rows
item_prototypes.description: Estimated number of dead rows.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: live rows
item_prototypes.description: Estimated number of live rows.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows deleted per second
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows deleted.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows HOT updated per second
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows HOT updated (i.e., with no separate index update required).

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows inserted per second
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows inserted.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows updated per second
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows updated.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: sequential scans
item_prototypes.description: Number of sequential scans initiated on this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: tuples read per second by sequential scans
item_prototypes.description: Number of live rows fetched by sequential scans.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks hits per second from TOAST indexes
item_prototypes.description: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table index (if any).

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks read per second from TOAST indexes
item_prototypes.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table index (if any).

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks hits per second from TOAST
item_prototypes.description: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table (if any).

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks read per second from TOAST
item_prototypes.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table (if any).

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL table {#TABLENAME} stat: vacuums
item_prototypes.description: Number of vacuum operations performed on this table.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL: table {#TABLENAME} rows count
item_prototypes.description: PostgreSQL single table rows count.

graphs.name: PostgreSQL summary db stats: block hit/read
PostgreSQL summary db stats: temp files
